channel.title: [508] please read - it cant be that hard [508]
channel.description: ok this really can't be that hard..I haven't seen a single tutorial on this on this website, i've made about 3 post on it asking with no responces.. How do I make shops in a 508...Please answer =)

item.source: [508] please read - it cant be that hard [508]

item.title: [508] please read - it cant be that hard [508]
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

open shops.java and under this

public int[] Tarn = {8013, 1856}; //Store2 public int[] TarnN = {1000000, 10000}; // stock

add this

public int[] shop name = {item ids here}; //Store2 public int[] shopnameN = {amt here}; // stock

save now open shophandler.java and search fore case 9:

add this under it

case 10: shopopen(p, 868); // shop id 868 general store. generalStore = true; items = Engine.shops.shopname; itemsN = Engine.shops.shopnameN; p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN);//Shop Inventory p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64271, 31, Engine.shops.shopname, Engine.shops.shopnameN);//Main Stock //set to 32 to be in playerstock p.frames.setString(p, "shopname", 620, 22); //TITLE break;

open npcoption2.java and look for

case 1658: // Npc id (shop2-magic) Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 5); break;

add this under it

case npc id: Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 10); break;

will add drops after i look into them

Read full topic
item.source: [508] please read - it cant be that hard [508]
